message: Let's start with a fair deal, Bob.  I'm sure we can find a better solution later on, but I want to be sure we both get something.
I think a 60/40 split is more fair, given the inflation rates. It's a good starting point for negotiation.

I understand your perspective, Bob. While a 60/40 split might seem fair considering inflation,  I'm willing to compromise. Let's meet in the middle with a 60/40 split, but this time in my favor.  I believe this is a good starting point for further discussion.
